name: The First Backrooms
description:
When an elderly woman goes missing under mysterious circumstances, a group of scientists and military personnel attempts to investigate the event only to find themselves thrown into a strange world of neverending, maze-like corridors with murderous entities that enhabit them.

Survive using stealth, weapons and strategic thinking in order to outsmart the deadly environment. Investigate the beautiful yet terrifying world, roam freely and pull your best attempt to find the missing elder but do never forget, you are not alone!

The game features a very intense experience through the maze-like environment known as the backrooms. Filled with horrors, entities as well as strangely familiar beauty.
Stay tuned for more updates, trailers & info!
